name: In My Pocket
description: For all those who are missing the old Firefox Pocket addon, here is an unofficial client for the excellent Pocket service. Goal is to provide a useful, but still lightweight means to access your Pocket account from your browser. Enjoy!

toggle-page-status.description: Send a 'toggle-page-status' event: adds the page to the item list, or archive it if it's already there

_execute_browser_action.description: Open the popup containing pocket items

open-first-item.description: Send a 'open-first-item' event: opens the first item of the list

open-random-item.description: Send a 'open-random-item' event: opens a random item of the list
